Body:
s = spectrographs.mdm_osmos.MDMOSMOSMDM4KSpectrograph()
example_file = os.path.join(os.environ['PYPEIT_DEV'], 'RAW_DATA',
    'mdm_osmos', 'MDM4K', 'MDM_science.fits')
assert os.path.isfile(example_file
    ), 'Could not find example file for MDM OSMOS read.'
det = 1
_, data, hdu, exptime, rawdatasec_img, oscansec_img = s.get_rawimage(
    example_file, det)
bpm = s.bpm(example_file, det)
assert data.shape == (1016, 4128)
assert bpm.shape == (4060, 1008)
dev_suite_required
